join.description: The first command to perform, this is what you do to gain entry into the guild! No other arguments required.

addresource.description: With this command you add a resource you appreciate to the Library, to be shared by your fellow Guild members

args.id: The id you want to give your new resource
args.name: The display name of the new resource
args.url: The full URL for the resource.
args.shortdesc: A short description of the resource

review.description: This is a way of sharing your thoughts on a resource previously added to the Library.

args.resource: The id of the resource you have reviewed.
args.url: The full URL to the review on your blog.

yearn.description: This command signals your intent to strive to wield a certain item.

complete.description: This is how you signal you have completed a certain phase.

args.phase: The id of the phase you have completed.
args.url: The full URL to the (mandatory) corresponding blog post.

thank.description: When having received a pull request from a fellow guild member, it is customary to give an official thank you through this command!

args.target: The id of the guild member who issued the pull request to you.
args.url: The full URL to the pull request on Github!

write.description: If you have written something on your blog that isn't directly tied to a phase or a resource, use this command.

args.url: The full URL to the blog post you want to share.

claim.description: When you have been deemed worthy of an item you've yearned to wield, use this command to fulfill your wishes!

brag.description: Having slayed a particularly stubborn bug or solved a hard problem, collect the admirations of your peers through this command!

args.url: The full URL to the commit on Github containing your deed. For full effect, this commit should be commented, explaining your greatness in detail!
